bug.short_desc: DateTimePicker doesn't work correctly on PageControl (TabView)

long_desc.thetext:
When I place a DateTimePicker (which I believe is Qooxdoo control, it's the one included in VCL For PHP 1.0) on a PageControl (which, again, I believe is a Qooxdoo control, same inclusion) the calendar doesn't appear to "pop up" when you click on the pull-down button. I believe (from what I've observed by placing it near other components) this is because the calendar is popping up "behind" everything else, as opposed to appearing (1) on the same "Layer", and (2) On top of all controls on that layer.
I openned up the qx.js file in VCL for PHP and did a search on "Version" and 6.5 came up, so I'm filing this as a 6.5 bug which may have already been fixed as I see we're up to 0.7. I don't necessarily have the ability to check a newer version at this time.
I think this is a bug of VCL4PHP. If you can't reproduce the same behavior in pure qooxdoo js code, please don't post such VCL related bugs here. Thank you.
